div.p: Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xv die februarij

The said day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday
that next cumis to James Strathachin to ansuer' to the borghe'
strekit one him be the wif of Wilyeame ranison' for the wrang
uis' haldin fra hir of xij s' iiij d' les to compt and rekning
for certane clatht as day of peremptoure

The saide day ellene the wif of Jonhne blak grantit hir avand'
to Katrine buchane hir douchtir xx s' quhilkis the balyeis chargit
hir to pay within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne talyour' oblist him be his hande and his gudis
to freithe the aldirman and ballieis of ane barrele of Salmonde
at the handis of Jonhne Wormet and pay it at the day of Jonhne
the baptist callit mydsommir next hereftir follouing

The saide day Alexander coule was in Amerciament of the Court for the
wranguis' haldin of xvj s' fra William snaipe Ande Jonhne
Sanclar' come Souerte for the pament of the saide money
be pasche next to cum

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' James sanclar
Colisone forspekar that William portar sal pay v s' Scottis
money to Richerd' barnis within xv dais

The xvj day of februar' the yer' forsaid' Jonhne of culane
deliuerit to the clerk the billis of the compt of the Somes
of Sanct nicholes bautkin and gert put tham in the common kist

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviij
die februarij Anno quo supra

Eodem die thomas mar' vocatus legittime non comparuit respondere
plegio super ipsum porrecto per murdacum glenmaluyn pro iniusta
detencione ab eo vij li' ad iustum calculum Igitur precipitur
thome Jameson seriando ad capiendum districtum a dicto thome et eundum
ad plegium dimitti si petatur et ipsum ad proximam Curiam
legalem premunire tanquam secundo die huius processus

The samyn day the consal present for the tyme ordanit that
nay nettis suld' be strekit of the fischingis assignit
to the masonnis of Sanct nicholes werk vnto the
tyme the martimes maile be pait And' fra Witsonday
furtht thai sal nocht fische the wattir quhile the male
of the saide Witsonday terme be pait

The saide day it was Sufficientlie preuit be diuers' famous'
personis vnsuspect tile ony party ande admittit be thame
batht In presence of the aldirman and Consal for the tyme
betuix William vmfray one that ane part And Androw vmfray
on that vthir part tueching al heretage of landis and gudis
pertening to thame be deces' of vmquhil mastir William
vmfray thar' brothir In maner and forme as eftir follouis
that is to say the said William sall caus' the said Androw
be putt in Sesin of all the croftis and landis that vmq
uhill the said mastir Williame deit last vestit and Sesit
liand' within the fridone of this burghe' eftir the
tenor' of our Souerane lordis brevis and lettres of Sesin
directit tharapon' And' in continent eftir the said Androw beis
In possession' of the Samyn he sal Infeft be chartir
and Sesin in deuforme one the sikirast wys' can be diuisit
but inconuenient' the said' William and his ayris heretable' m in the
Spittall croft with the talys the stane Rude the Sandy
daill and the berne Rud' with the haill berne In the Inland' haill
Reseruand' four' fute to the said' Androw nerrast the forland'
Ande the half of the yard with vys' to the well Reseruit to
the said' Androw with vsche and Entre in and to the said half
yard and well in lesome tymes as efferis personis tile ane
yard and well nochtwithstanding the said Androw sal mak
nayne vthir habitacion within the said Williamis Inland' bot
vys' to his pece of yard and well in lesome and behusome
tymes et cetera to the kepin' of the quhilkis appontment bath the said partiis
ar' oblist and Suorne but fraud' or gile et cetera

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
februarij Anno quo supra

Eodem die georgius talyour amerciatur pro perturbio Johannis stevin
cuj emendabit ut iura volunt Et dictus Johannes amerciatur pro
perturbio ipsius georgei cuj emendabit ut iura volunt
Insuper Idem georgius inuenit Alexandrum nachty plegium legalem
quod dictus Johannes et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sua
aliter quam per viam iuris Et dictus Johannes inuenit Duncanum
Colisone plegium legalem quod Idem georgius et pars sua erunt
Indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et
quolibet dictarum parcium obligatur per manuum ostensionem ad releuandum
plegios suos de huiusmodi fideiussione prout Iidem'Ii' overwrites 'ee'. parte plegio fide
media obligatur' et similiter ad intrandum dictas partes cum premunita
fuerint coram ballivis

The samyn day Wat atkin was conuickit be ane suorne' assis' Robert
blinsel forspekar' for the haldin of ane wrangvis' pek quhar'for
he was in Amerciament'A' overwrites 'na'. of the court and to amend' as law vill ande
forber' the tyme tocum

The said' day vat akin was in amerciament of this court be ane
Suorne' assis' Robert blinsel forspekar' for strublans' of the court
to Amend' as law wile and forber in tyme to Cum

The said' day Dauid stevart was in amerciament of this court be
ane Suorne' assis' Robert blinsel for spekar' for strubulans' of the
Court

the Antepennult day of februar the yer' forsaid' In presence of
Walter lichtone balye to the hous' of arbrothoc and thomas
fyf ane of the balyeis of Abirdene Alexander forbes oblist him be
the fatht of his bodie to content and pay to Robert Crage
tua bollis of meile tharof ane barrel within xx dais and ane
boll at nev corne

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die marcij
Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday
that next cumis to androw Culane yongar to bringe and schew his
richtis anent the fischingis of ane thirde parte of Done and forbede
and maid' Inhibicion to the saide Androw that he nor nayne belang
and' him suld Intromett with the saide fischingis vnto the
tyme he schew his richtis of the samyn and to ansuer for
the wranguis' fisching of the samyn'

The saide day the aldirman chargit the officiaris to warne the
tennentis of the raik to comper one the next monunday to ansuer'
and do resone to Androw Culane that clamys ane demi neth' of the
fisching of the raik and askit marovschipe to fische the samyn

The saide day Androw muresone grantit him avand' to Jonhne
chapman xxij s' for Alexander angouson' quhilkis the balyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

The samyn day Williame Kintor grantit him avande to
Androw Culane yongar half ane barrell of Salmond'
sufficient merchand' gude to be pait at the next mydsommir'

Eodem die Willelmus de Camera fecit constituit et nominavit
Alexandrum de Camera patrem suum Alexandrum de Camera et dominum Johannem
Stirueling coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores legittimos cum potestate
subsciend' vnum et plures ad petendum associacionem ad piscariam
suam tercie partis rethis de Done Ac in cum omnibus aliis actionibus
ipsum concernentibus promitten' de Rato et grato et cetera

The samyn day Williame goldsmitht grantit him dettour
to Jamis Kinge for aucht s' and vij d' and promittit to pay it
within terme of law

The samyne day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monun
day cum xv dais to Androw murray to ansuer' to the borghe'
Strekit on him be dene nichol Sclugy for the wrang
uis' haldin fra him of xxij merkis to gude compt and rekning
as day of peremptour'

Eodem die dominus nicholaius Sclugy fecit constituit
et creauit Willelmum blinsel et dominum Johannem blak coniunctim et
divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad prosequendum Andream murray pro
xxij marcis agendum et defendendum et cetera promitten' de Rato et
grato obligando se Judicio Cisti et Judicat' soluere et cetera

the saide day Williame of chamer askit at the aldirman
and ballieis marrowschip to fische and Strek his thridpart
of nethis apone the wattir of Done

The samyn day thomas fif producit ane letter of v tak ondir
the commone Sele of demi nethis fisching of the raik Ande askit
marrowschip to Streik and fische his said' fischinge

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die
marcij Anno quo supra

The samyn day the ballieis follouit Androw Culane curat
to Alexander Symsone Sone and ayr to vmquhile Dauid
Symsone for the wranguis' hald fischinge of the thrid
parte of ane neth' of Done quhilkis he denyit and in continent
the saide actione was put to the decisione of ane assis'
of thir personis wndir writin that is to say Alexander menyeis Robert
blinsele Thomas prat Jonhne Wormet thomas mar' Wil
yeame blinsele Dauid mathesone Androw murray
Walter auchneyve Will portar Dauid mar Jonhne Steuin
sone murthou glenmaluyn Alexander angosoune and Jonhne
moire quhilkis riplie avisit the richtis and resonnis of bath
the said' partiis herd and vndirstandin deliuerit and declarit
be thar aithis that thai cane nocht deliuer in the said' matir
becaus' the aldirman In the nayme of the tone and Alexander chamer
and Williame of Kintor assedacionar of Done allegit certane
andThere is at least one word omitted before this. offerit to schew the law tharapone that the saide
Androw Curate to the saide Alexander hede nay richt to the
saide fischinge becaus' the saide Dauid decessit or his
Entre with the saide fischinge and was nocht in the thridpart of
ane nethis and tuk ane day to produce the saide allegeance
the law day eftir pasche

The saide day the aldirman chargit the officiaris to warne
the haile consaile and al the gudmene of the tone to cum
to the tolbutht one fryday that next cumis be ix houris
Ande al the tennentis of the Raik and Done thar to avis'
thar to for the cituacion and gude reule of the saide wattiris
for pece vnite and concord to be tretit ymange nichtbouris
and tranquilite of the towne

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die marcij
Anno quo supra

the saide day the seriandis philp Dunbrek and thomas Jamisone
deponit the gret aithe that thai at commavnd' of the aldirman
balyeis and consal warnit al the tennentis of the Raik to
comper this day befor thame for gude reule of the tone
and cituacion' of the wattiris and In defalt of thir personis that wald'
nocht comper that is to say Alexander menyeis Jonhne Culane
Alexander mar' the Intromettouris of the demi nethis of vmquhile James
leslie and Jonhne Knollis demi nethis and Dauid menyeis and wthir
diuers' and Sindrie of the best and wourthiast of the consale
the aldirman coud' mak nay reule nor reformacion
for the tranquillite of the tone protestand Solempt
nitlie that quhat trubule or skatht happinis to cum suld'
turne him to nay preiudice considerand' he was redy
to do iustice at his pouer'

the saide day Jonhne chavmer was conuikit be ane assis'
for the wranguis' haldin of vj s' and j d' and ob' to be pait
within terme of law to Dauid' mathesone

The samyne day murthow glenmaluyn becum Souerte be his
hand' vphaldin to Jonhne Wormet for ane barrel of salmond'
for Ellene the wif of Jonhne blak to be pait at the next
mydsommir' Ande the saide Ellene oblist hir' be hir hande
to releyf the said murthow of the said' barrel of Salmond'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xjo die marcij Anno quo supra

The saide day Williame of Kintor was conuikit be ane assis'
for the wranguis' fischinge of mair' of the wattir of Done
that he has in assedacion and was in Amerciament of the court and to amend'
as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xviij die marcij
Anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid Kintor legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio
super ipsum porrecto per Johannem malisone pro iniusta detencione
ab eo summe xliiij s' et vj d' pro aliis bonis et summis in eodem
contentis non comparuit Igitur precipitur thome Jamesone seriando ad
capiendum districtum a dicto Dauid et eundem ad plegium di
mitti si petatur et ipsum ad proximam Curiam legalem premunire
tanquam die huius processus
